page.title: 02ARLEY HOUSE FARM STUDY
page.content: Arley House is owned by Mr.King.It is 200 acres and is used for mixed farming(mainly dairy).50 acres of corn are grown and much is left to grass. {LIVESTOCK:}90 Freesham cows,30 Hereford cross,80 Dairy calves. {EQUIPTMENT:}4 Tractors,and various manure spreading vehicles.Rented equipment include combine harvesters, and silage harvesters. {LABOUR:}The family(3) work on the farm.Casual labour is hired for harvesting. {HISTORY:}The family have been at the farm for 3 generations.The main change has been towards dairy farming.Pig farming may be developed in the future Barns have been added to the original farm buildings.
